name: Coalescence
description:
Coalescence is a visual novel that invites you into Moniker Labs for a night of festivities, romance and terror!

Key Features
As you explore Moniker's halls, you'll meet people who've been effected in by the corporation in some capacity. Each with their own views and opinions of you as the story progresses. Dialogue choices will raise and lower a companion's overall opinion of you depending on your decision. A low opinion will lock off certain endings and relationships once possible with that character. While a high opinion will unlock new dialogue and a possible romance!


Play as one of three characters, each with their own backstory and unique options to use in dialogue.



The Journalist

The Journalist is a cunning reporter who will stop at nothing to uncover the truth behind Moniker. With their strong background in investigative reporting, the Journalist can use the Investigate dialogue ability to ask insightful questions that gives more information on the current subject.



The Detective is a private investigator who’s been drawn into something bigger than they could’ve realized. From their many years of experience, the Detective is able to use Deduction to pick up on small details that help get a better picture of the situation.



The Lab Technician is a scientist who’s been forced into the Moniker conspiracy due to an incident with the Entity. With their newfound ability, [REDACTED], the Lab Tech aims to stop Moniker’s plot by any means necessary!
